    public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
    A Zombie. This Zombie is pretty boring. It needs to be made more interesting.
    Author:
    ram

    • Method Detail

      • dropArm

        public void dropArm​(int Arm)
        method for zombie to drop arm. If numArm == 0 where it already dropped 2 arms then it can't drop any as Zombie has only 2 arms.
        Parameters:
        Arm - integer that represent the number of arms of the zombie

      • dropLeg

        public void dropLeg​(int Leg)
        method for zombie to drop leg. If numleg == 0 where it already dropped 2 legs then it can't drop any as Zombie has only 2 legs.
        Parameters:
        Leg - integer that represent the number of legs of the zombie

      • getArm

        public int getArm()
        method to return the number of arm of zombie.
        Returns:
        number of arm(s) of the zombie

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

        public IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()

      • getBite

        public IntrinsicWeapon getBite()
        Zombie can bite human with damage 20 , verb "bites". After Zombie bites, it heals 5 health point.
        Returns:
        a new InstricticWeapon represent the mouth of a zombie which is used to bite.

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn​(Actions actions,
                       Action lastAction,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        Before Zombie attack, it has a 10% chance of shouting "BRAAAAAAAINS!" but this will not take an action. If a Zombie can attack, it will. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • create_corpse

        public java.lang.String create_corpse​(GameMap map)
        Description copied from interface: ActorInterface
        This method removes an actor and creates a corpse at the actor location when the actor is killed.
        Parameters:
        map - The GameMap the actor is currently in
        Returns:
        String that shows that an actor is killed or empty String if actor is not killed.
